title: From John O'Groats to Land's End; Or, 1372 miles on foot; A book of days and chronicle of adventures by two pedestrians on tour
author: Naylor, John Anderton
snippet: In the churchyard at Teviothead, HenryScott Riddell, the author of _Scotland Yet_, had only recently beenburied.

title: From John O'Groats to Land's End; Or, 1372 miles on foot; A book of days and chronicle of adventures by two pedestrians on tour
author: Naylor, John Anderton
snippet: At Teviothead our road parted company with the River Teviot, whichforked away to the right, its source being only about six miles fartherup the hills from that point.
